title: TIME MANAGEMENT
content:
Hey everyone,

I'm a 2nd-year student aiming to get good at Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) and web development. How many hours per week should I dedicate to each to make significant progress? Also, I plan to start going to the gym regularly. Will I have enough time to balance all three?

Any advice or personal experiences would be appreciated!

comments.body:
Heyy!!

If u wanna hit gym then u need to have 8hrs of sleep every day, soo if u go gym for 2hrs a day than 10 hrs are gone there only and 8hrs of college. All u have is 4 hrs left and in that time u need to manage academics + DSA. Now u think, will u able to manage. Also one important thing if u go gym ull be tired. I used to sleep 1st 2 classes everyday üòÅ. 

So I would suggest start one thing either gym or DSA. Do that consistently for one or two months. Then start the other one. Ig then ull able to figure out what to. And also both gym and DSA need consistency üí™üèª

All the best !!
